Docker Desktop.Description: Docker Desktop is an application for MacOS and Windows that enables you to build, share, and run containerized applications

Git.Description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency

GitHub Desktop.Description: GitHub Desktop is an open-source Electron-based GitHub app for Windows and macOS

Visual Studio Code.Description: Visual Studio Code is a free source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS

Node.js.Description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser

Visual Studio Community 2022.Description: Visual Studio Community is a free, fully-featured IDE for students, open-source and individual developers

Python 3.10.Description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively

Cursor.Description: Cursor is a modern code editor for developers, built on top of Visual Studio Code
